Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.7.3-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.7.3-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package influxdb is earlier than 2.7.3-6, affected by CVE-2023-45288
